pub_date: 2010-09-17  A novel cylindrical TE<sub>2,1</sub> mode converter
title: Review of Scientific Instruments This paper examines the numerical design, simulation, construction and testing of a rectangular to cylindrical waveguide mode converter. Using slots machined along the length of the cylindrical section, mode conversion can be forced from the TE1,0 rectangular mode to the TE2,1 cylindrical mode. D.A. Constable, X.S. Fampris, K. Ronald, W. He, C.G. Whyte, and C.W. Robertson, (2010). "A novel TE2,1 mode converter", Rev. Sci. Instrum., 81, 094702. mode-converter https://aip.scitation.org/doi/10.1063/1.3480994
